title: Aspen

home.title: Hey- I'm Aspen.
home.description:
Product designer at Government Technology Agency, Singapore // previously, UX intern at Cargill, Inc.


I currently view design as a tool to either empower those next in line to do their best work, or build trust between users and emerging technologies.

about:
I was born and raised in always-sunny Singapore before heading to the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in the freezing cold midwestern part of the United States for school.

I made a 180-degree pivot from a primarily science-based education to fine arts degree in industrial design, before ending up in tech as a product designer. Honestly, I think it's the best of both worlds.
